LibraryFunction: ^"They have a whole stock of fiction and non-fiction stuff here, for all your literary needs."
^"There's also a book club that meets a few times a week."
^[Timothy] "It's... um... a little claustrophobic in here."
^] "Yeah... they fit a 'lotta books into a small space."
^"They have book recommendations, if you find the selection overwhelming."
^"I find that reading can give me a better perspective on things, which helps me to act with a bit more <color=color_grace>grace</color>."
^"But I'm not a fast reader, so it kinda <color=color_wellbeing_penalty>stresses</color> me out. Reading at night also makes me extra <color=color_wellbeing_penalty>fatigued</color>."
WeekOne: ^"I haven't really spent much time in here, but I probably should..."

c: ^"Do you want to browse the selection?"
^"How about we check out the recommended books?"

Repeat: ^"What kind of books do you like Timothy?"
^[Timothy] "Uh... I like adventure books. Fantasy books, too, I guess"
^] "Cool, like, choose your own adventure books?"
^"Really, anything with a big map in the front."
^] "Oh, gotcha. I'm sure they've got stuff like that here somewhere. Want to look around?"
